name: Optimyzee, Inc.
description: Developer of an AI-powered ad management platform designed for small businesses and freelancers. The company's platform structures and optimizes Google ad campaigns, make marketing strategies, and finds relevant ad channels, enabling businesses to build a strong online presence to take the company to the next level and provide a unique advantage over competitors.
one_liner: Developer of an AI-powered ad management platform designed for small businesses and freelancers. The company's platform structures and optimizes Google ad campaigns, make marketing strategies, and finds relevant ad channels, enabling businesses to build a strong online presence to take the company to the next level and provide a unique advantage over competitors.
